help-file.title: "FIRE MAGUS"
help-file.content:
The Fire Magus concentrates on offensive magic by using the element of fire. He possesses extremely powerful spells, reducing his enemies to a mere pile of ash.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Protection from Fire
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 8th circle: Magma Burst 9th circle: Solar Flare
